duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the mechanical design, build, and commissioning of complex process automation equipment.
Lead small cross-functional teams during the development of automated machine solutions.
Define new automation designs that enable the lowest cost manufacturing strategies for Corning optical communications.

Collaborate with advanced research & development, division engineering, and manufacturing teams during the design of new equipment solutions, new product introductions, process improvements, and raw material changes.
Lead resolution of complex equipment-related design or manufacturing issues impacting quality, cost, or delivery or safety.
Collaborate with outside suppliers on specifying and procuring various equipment, automation systems, and machine components to support projects.

education_certification.credential: BS or MS degree in Mechanical Engineering
